page.title: 09The church, Hilmarton.
page.content: The church in Hilmarton is called St Laurence's church.The church has many memorials to people who lived in Hilmarton village. People help the church by arranging flowers, cutting grass, cleaning the church, raising money and ringing the church bells.The church is looked after by the vicar, church wardens and the parochial church council, who are elected by the parish members.Sometimes the school goes to church at special times like harvest-festival.The vicar goes to see people especially when they are ill.He does lots of different services like christenings, weddings, funerals, holy communion, evening and family services. The church hall has lots of different activities taking place in it, including, concerts, parties and a playgroup. The church hall is on the A.3102,next to the garage.
